title: Narrow Escape

title: WebGL Bird Game
description: Prototype game where you play as a bird tasked with gathering eggs and dropping them on a nest. The whole project, including the meshes and animation were done in WebGL.

description: Prototype game where you can watch a train locomotive go around a circle train track, stopping at the various train stations for a time. The whole project, including the meshes and animation were done in WebGL.
